alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Brantley, central Ware, northeastern Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms and strong outflow along a line extending from near Homerville to near Argyle to near Manor to near Stephen Foster State Park. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Homerville, Argyle, Boggy Bay, Manor, Braganza, Race Pond and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
